attributes.action: Make Bristol City Council help people into a home with more bedrooms if they with to foster or adopt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Myself & my partner wish to start fostering children, we are unable to do so at the moment because we do not have enough bedrooms.

You must have one spare bedroom per child you wish to foster/adopt before Bristol City Council Fostering & Adoption will consider your application.

The housing department of Bristol City Council will not allow you to move into another property with any spare bedrooms until you have been accepted for fostering or adoption.

How is anyone ever going to get anywhere if they want to Foster or Adopt?

Please help by signing this petition to allow people like myself foster and/or adopt.
